about.title: About Us
about.text1:
Founded in 2015, SPARKTEL is one of the leading providers of reliable and innovative internet services in Azerbaijan. Since the first day of operation, the company has been offering high-quality internet connectivity and modern communication solutions to both residential and corporate customers.
The scope of SPARKTEL includes internet services, wireless communication, IP TV, data channels, IP telephony systems, and local network installation. Our team of professional engineers and technical specialists continuously improves their knowledge and skills to provide services based on the latest technologies. Our goal is to ensure customer comfort with stable connection, personalized service, 24/7 support, and modern equipment based on fiber-optic technology.
about.text2: SPARKTEL always stands out with a strong technical team, reliable service, and continuous development.

internet.title: Internet
internet.desc: High-reliability and broadband internet connection ensuring uninterrupted operation of your organization.

iptv.title: IP TV
iptv.desc: Interactive television service with HD quality.

wireless.title: Wireless Communication
wireless.desc: Secure and high-performance wireless network solutions tailored to infrastructure requirements.

ipphone.title: IP Telephony
ipphone.desc: VoIP system based on SIP protocol; PBX management and integration features.

localnet.title: Local Network Setup
localnet.desc: Local network infrastructure built according to the technical standards of the enterprise.

datacanal.title: Data Channel
datacanal.desc: Secure data transmission channels over MPLS/VPLS or Metro Ethernet.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: Is there any installation fee for Sparktel services?
faq.a1: There is no installation fee; the subscriber only pays the monthly fee of the selected tariff plan.
faq.q2: Can I change my tariff at any time?
faq.a2: Yes, you can change your tariff at any time by contacting the customer support line.
faq.q3: Which number can I call for technical support?
faq.a3: For technical support, you can contact our call center at 070-565-22-22 or 012-565-22-22.
faq.q4: What are the working hours of the call center?
faq.q5: Is the modem or router provided by the provider?
faq.a5: During installation, a modem is provided free of charge for the duration of use. Additional Wi-Fi extenders or mesh systems can be added upon request.
faq.q6: How can I pay my monthly subscription?
faq.a6: Payments can be made online via Hesab.az, FPay.az, ABB Mobile app, or through Emanat and ExpressPay terminals by entering your subscriber code.
faq.q7: What are the main advantages offered by Sparktel?
faq.a7: With over 10 years of experience, Sparktel provides stable, high-speed internet and reliable technical support for residential and business customers. The services include wireless connectivity, IP TV, IP telephony, data channels, and local network setup.
faq.q8: How can I become a Sparktel subscriber?
faq.a8: To become a subscriber, simply call our support line and provide your address.
faq.q9: In which areas are corporate services available?
faq.a9: Corporate services are available regardless of location. You can contact us directly to get service for your address.
faq.q10: What should I do if I experience internet issues?
faq.a10: If there is an interruption or problem, please contact our 24/7 technical support line for investigation.
